# The `MergeCandidate` Struct Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

A set of MachineInstrs that fulfill (nearly all) conditions to get merged into a LDM/STM. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

A set of MachineInstrs that fulfill (nearly all) conditions to get merged into a LDM/STM.
